summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges, discounts, and payment information related to a shipment made on November 1, 2002. The total amount due is $14.29, with a payment deadline of November 26, 2002.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is the account holder for the shipping services.

events.title: Shipment Pickup
events.description: A package was picked up by FedEx for delivery.

events.title: Invoice Issuance
events.description: An invoice was issued to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping charges.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The total amount due on the invoice is $14.29.
The payment is due by November 26, 2002.
The invoice details a shipment picked up on November 1, 2002.
Jeffrey Epstein is the sole individual mentioned in the invoice.
